Articles.Content:
Very simple question.

When did you started playing KSP?

I started in 0.9

And you?

NOTE: Please, don't attack newer members.

Edited February 9, 2014 by gmpd2000
I really dedicated my time to it I think, in 0.18.. When docking was introduced. Before I've seen it thanks to Scott Manley, and just tried it.
In the early days, can't remember the exact version no I joined at tbh..
I joined end of August, it was .21, but i had started with the .18 demo in early august
Heh, I just added these details to my sig a few days ago.
Bought it at 0.17, really started playing at 0.20.
Tried the demo in late June (.18 demo) joined a day after.21 came.
A week ago tomorrow for the full game, so 0.23. A week or two earlier for the demo.
Am i the only guy on the Thread who joined 19.
0.20 still had the mold flash on it when I showed up.
I started playing in 0.15 or 0.16, don't exactly remember
Wow, I'm surprised how few of the really early people are still around...
i got it in 0.9
0.23, just after the update. Was an early(ish) Christmas prezzie to myself. Best. Purchase. Ever.

0.14.1 is when I showed up, just after the update I believe.

Edit: nova, why did you think old players would leave?
What was the version just before they added the Mun? Thats when i started. Ah, memories!
According to Steam - 27th August 2013 so I think it was 0.20, tried the demo and bought it within 20 mins

What was the version just before they added the Mun? Thats when i started. Ah, memories!

It was 0.11 IIRC
v0.10.1 - there wasn't even an orbital map view back then

Let's see.

There were complains about the LVT-30 being OP (because fuel now flowed down stacks of tanks!), and the next big feature to be added was symmetry.

0.8.0

I installed and know of this game for like 1 year, but only played demo every now and then up to a week ago when I decided to get the full version.

So I guess 0.23

Dont ask me which version I played first on demo though, dont remember.
I discovered the game in 0.14 and bought it after the release of 0.15. Am I a vet yet?

I discovered the game in 0.14 and bought it after the release of 0.15. Am I a vet yet?

Yes, most definitely! (IMO)
I've been playing since 18.2 ~ Jan 2013
